item.title: The Socio-political Manifesto
item.description: Alright—if you were to write a political and social manifesto, it wouldn’t be some pamphlet of hollow idealism or populist sloganeering. It’d be fire wrapped in philosophy, rebellion dressed in reason. The title needs to carry both weight and wit — something that sounds like it’s been whispered across centuries but written for this collapsing decade. Here are a few possible directions, depending on the tone you want to strike:
